\chapter{\textcolor{Chapter }{Introduction}}\label{intro}

{
  \cite{homalg-project} }

   
\chapter{\textcolor{Chapter }{Installation of the \textsf{IO{\textunderscore}ForHomalg} Package}}\label{install}
\logpage{[ 2, 0, 0 ]}
\hyperdef{L}{X7C0C07887B02CF8A}{}
{
  To install this package just extract the package's archive file to the \textsf{GAP} \texttt{pkg} directory.

 By default the \textsf{IO{\textunderscore}ForHomalg} package is not automatically loaded by \textsf{GAP} when it is installed. You must load the package with \\
\\
 \texttt{LoadPackage}( "IO{\textunderscore}ForHomalg" ); \\
\\
 before its functions become available.

 Please, send us an e-mail if you have any questions, remarks, suggestions,
etc. concerning this package. Also, we would be pleased to hear about
applications of this package. \\
\\
\\
 Thomas B{\"a}chler, Mohamed Barakat, Max Neunh{\"o}ffer, and Daniel Robertz  }
